thread.title: Recognizing Correctional Officers as Law Enforcement
thread.title_full: Recognizing Correctional Officers as Law Enforcement

title: Recognizing Correctional Officers as Law Enforcement
text:
target: President Donald Trump, United States 
Correctional Officers should be recognized in The United States as Law Enforcement. We are a form of Law Enforcement and should be recognized as such. read petition letter â–¾ 
Sir, 
I attached my name to this online petition because I believe Correctional Officers should be recognized as Law Enforcement. They work a very thankless and dangerous job. 
Thank you for your time,
